sentences.en: All nature seemed pregnant with life.
sentences.cn: 整个大自然似乎充满了活力.

sentences.en: care for pregnant women
sentences.cn: 孕妇保健

sentences.en: Every phrase in this poem is pregnant with meaning.
sentences.cn: 这首诗的片言只语都充满深意。

sentences.en: He stopped, and there was a pregnant pause.
sentences.cn: 他停住了，那是个意味深长的停顿。

sentences.en: His wife was heavily pregnant (= almost ready to give birth ) .
sentences.cn: 他的妻子即将临产。

sentences.en: His words were followed by a pregnant pause.
sentences.cn: 他说完话,接着是一段意味深长的停顿.

sentences.en: I didn’t mean to get her pregnant (= make her pregnant ) .
sentences.cn: 我没想让她怀孕。

sentences.en: I discovered I was pregnant.
sentences.cn: 我发现自己怀孕了。

sentences.en: I knew right away that I was pregnant.
sentences.cn: 我立即明白我怀孕了。

sentences.en: I thought I was too old to get pregnant .
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己年龄太大，已经不能怀孕了。

sentences.en: Iron and folic acid supplements are frequently given to pregnant women.
sentences.cn: 铁剂和叶酸片常被配给孕妇服用。

sentences.en: Janet looked very pregnant.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特看上去显然是怀孕了。

sentences.en: Lainey was, unbelievably, pregnant again.
sentences.cn: 莱内又怀孕了，真让人难以相信。

sentences.en: Lena got pregnant and married.
sentences.cn: 莉娜怀孕并结婚了。

sentences.en: Most pregnant women remain off cigarettes while carrying the child.
sentences.cn: 大多数孕妇都在孕期戒了烟。

sentences.en: Pregnant women who are heavy drinkers risk damaging the unborn foetus.
sentences.cn: 孕妇酗酒可能会危及腹中胎儿。

sentences.en: She is a pregnant woman.
sentences.cn: 她是一名孕妇.

sentences.en: She is five months pregnant.
sentences.cn: 她怀孕5个月了.

sentences.en: The number of women who become pregnant after adopting children is legion.
sentences.cn: 领养小孩后怀孕的妇女比比皆是。

sentences.en: The pregnant woman looked forward to her maternity.
sentences.cn: 孕妇期待着做母亲.

sentences.en: Then she dropped her bombshell. " I'm pregnant.
sentences.cn: ”然后她说出了令人震惊的事, “ 我怀孕了. ”

sentences.en: This was a sickening attack on a pregnant and defenceless woman.
sentences.cn: 这一起对毫无防御能力的孕妇的袭击，令人无比震惊。

words.tran_cn: 怀孕；丰富，多产；意义深长

trans.tran_cn: 怀孕的，孕育着…的，富于想象的，富于成果的
trans.tran_en: if a woman or female animal is pregnant, she has an unborn baby growing inside her body
